Index of FreeRADIUS.org's RFC site

	This directory contains a superset of the RADIUS related
	RFC's, drafts, and meeting minutes.  The original documents
	come from:

	ftp://ftp.livingston.com/pub/radius/
	ftp://ftp.ietf.org/internet-drafts/*radius*
